thread.title: Transport Minister to visit South Devon Link road site | Country (W)
thread.title_full: Transport Minister to visit South Devon Link road site | West Country (W) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Transport Minister to visit South Devon Link road site | Country (W)
text:
A construction worker at the South Devon Link site. Credit: ITV West Country The Transport Minister Andrew Jones is due to visit the South Devon Link road site later today.
The Â£109 million project has been 30 years in the making.
The final phase is currently under construction and when it's finished it will run between Newton Abbot and Torquay, with the aim of relieving traffic congestion on the A380.
Last updated Wed 5 Aug 2015 Travel Devon
